page.title: 10Sharnbrook Playing Field
page.content: The Playing Field in Lodge Road is owned, on behalf of the villagers,by the{Charity Commissioners.} They delegate their powers of management to the{Parish Council,}who, in turn, delegate them to an{annually elected {management committee.} All residents are entitled to vote, and those elected are joined by nominees from the principal sports clubs -{Bowls, {Tennis, Cricket and Football. Facilities include a full sized football pitch, tennis courts, bowling green abd cricket square. These are served by a licenced pavillion and clubhouse. There is a children's play area in one corner of the field. Day to day maintainence is carried out by volunteers, assisted when necessary by people with professional skills.
